title: Bobby Is Bringing Eddie And Raymundo On A Date + The Scary Movie Draft + Bobby’s Mailbag: Guy’s Girlfriend Wants Him To Reverse Vasectomy
itunes:title: Bobby Is Bringing Eddie And Raymundo On A Date + The Scary Movie Draft + Bobby’s Mailbag: Guy’s Girlfriend Wants Him To Reverse Vasectomy
description:
In our new segment, ‘Relationship Island’ we find out that Bobby is going to the Titans game this weekend with a girl, but also invited Eddie and Raymundo. Plus, we draft our favorite scary movies and open up the mailbag from a listener whose girlfriend wants him to reverse his vasectomy so they can have kids when they get married.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
